Quote.Author: B. F. Skinner
Quote.QuoteValue: The environment will continue to deteriorate until pollution practices are abandoned

Quote.Author: B. F. Skinner
Quote.QuoteValue: Properly used, positive reinforcement is extremely powerful

Quote.Author: B. F. Skinner
Quote.QuoteValue: Education is what survives when what has been learned has been forgotten

Quote.Author: B. F. Skinner
Quote.QuoteValue: Reinforcement is being right

Quote.Author: B. F. Skinner
Quote.QuoteValue: The consequences of an act affect the probability of its occurring again

Quote.Author: B. F. Skinner
Quote.QuoteValue: Give me a child and I'll shape him into anything

Quote.Author: B. F. Skinner
Quote.QuoteValue: When you run into something interesting, drop everything else and study it

Quote.Author: B. R. Ambedkar
Quote.QuoteValue: The relationship between husband and wife should be one of closest friends

Quote.Author: B. R. Ambedkar
Quote.QuoteValue: I like the religion that teaches liberty, equality and fraternity

Quote.Author: B. R. Ambedkar
Quote.QuoteValue: Cultivation of mind should be the ultimate aim of human existence

Quote.Author: B. R. Ambedkar
Quote.QuoteValue: I measure the progress of a community by the degree of progress which women have achieved

Quote.Author: B. R. Ambedkar
Quote.QuoteValue: Life should be great rather than long

Quote.Author: B. R. Ambedkar
Quote.QuoteValue: Religion and slavery are incompatible

Quote.Author: B. R. Ambedkar
Quote.QuoteValue: Generally speaking, the Smritikars never care to explain the why and the how of their dogmas

Quote.Author: B. R. Ambedkar
Quote.QuoteValue: We are Indians, firstly and lastly

Quote.Author: B. R. Ambedkar
Quote.QuoteValue: A great man is different from an eminent one in that he is ready to be the servant of the society

Quote.Author: B. R. Ambedkar
Quote.QuoteValue: In Hinduism, conscience, reason and independent thinking have no scope for development

Quote.Author: Babe Ruth
Quote.QuoteValue: You just can't beat the person who never gives up

Quote.Author: Babe Ruth
Quote.QuoteValue: Yesterday's home runs don't win today's games

Quote.Author: Babe Ruth
Quote.QuoteValue: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run

Quote.Author: Babe Ruth
Quote.QuoteValue: Baseball was, is and always will be to me the best game in the world

Quote.Author: Babe Ruth
Quote.QuoteValue: Never let the fear of striking out get in your way

Quote.Author: Babe Ruth
Quote.QuoteValue: Baseball changes through the years. It gets milder

Quote.Author: Babe Ruth
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't mean to hit the umpire with the dirt, but I did mean to hit that bastard in the stands

Quote.Author: Babe Ruth
Quote.QuoteValue: If I'd just tried for them dinky singles I could've batted around .600

Quote.Author: Babe Ruth
Quote.QuoteValue: I had only one superstition. I made sure to touch all the bases when I hit a home run

Quote.Author: Babe Ruth
Quote.QuoteValue: Who is richer? The man who is seen, but cannot see? Or the man who is not being seen, but can see?

Quote.Author: Baltasar Gracian
Quote.QuoteValue: A beautiful woman should break her mirror early

Quote.Author: Baltasar Gracian
Quote.QuoteValue: Know or listen to those who know

Quote.Author: Baltasar Gracian
Quote.QuoteValue: Never have a companion that casts you in the shade

Quote.Author: Baltasar Gracian
Quote.QuoteValue: Friendship multiplies the good of life and divides the evil

Quote.Author: Baltasar Gracian
Quote.QuoteValue: The wise does at once what the fool does at last

Quote.Author: Baltasar Gracian
Quote.QuoteValue: Great ability develops and reveals itself increasingly with every new assignment

Quote.Author: Baltasar Gracian
Quote.QuoteValue: Dreams will get you nowhere, a good kick in the pants will take you a long way

Quote.Author: Baltasar Gracian
Quote.QuoteValue: A single lie destroys a whole reputation of integrity

Quote.Author: Baltasar Gracian
Quote.QuoteValue: Without courage, wisdom bears no fruit

Quote.Author: Baltasar Gracian
Quote.QuoteValue: Never open the door to a lesser evil, for other and greater ones invariably slink in after it

Quote.Author: Ban K
Quote.QuoteValue: oon - Terrorism is a significant threat to peace and security, prosperity and people

Quote.Author: Ban K
Quote.QuoteValue: oon - The Arab Awakening or Arab Spring has transformed the geopolitical landscape

Quote.Author: Ban K
Quote.QuoteValue: oon - This Earth is our only home. Together, we must protect and cherish it

Quote.Author: Ban K
Quote.QuoteValue: oon - As a child growing up during the Korean War, I knew poverty. I studied by candlelight

Quote.Author: Ban K
Quote.QuoteValue: oon - Equality for women is progress for all

Quote.Author: Ban K
Quote.QuoteValue: oon - Pacific Islands are among those that contribute least to global warming, yet suffer most

Quote.Author: Ban K
Quote.QuoteValue: oon - The United Nations is committed to ridding the world of anti-personnel landmines

Quote.Author: Ban K
Quote.QuoteValue: oon - The United Nations has a proud record of helping millions of people in mine-affected countries

Quote.Author: Ban K
Quote.QuoteValue: oon - Raising ambition in 2014 is crucial for arriving at a meaningful climate agreement in 2015

Quote.Author: Ban K
Quote.QuoteValue: oon - Nuclear disarmament is one of the greatest legacies we can pass on to future generations

Quote.Author: Banks
Quote.QuoteValue: Being brave enough to just be unapologetic for who you are, that's a goddess

Quote.Author: Banks
Quote.QuoteValue: I always say my music is like dark blue or black, like a punch to your gut that feels really good

Quote.Author: Banks
Quote.QuoteValue: Every artist is an artist, and every heartbeat is a heartbeat

Quote.Author: Banks
Quote.QuoteValue: I make really good pasta sauce. The secret to getting it right is just patience and love

Quote.Author: Banks
Quote.QuoteValue: If you meet me, you might not get to know me. If you hear my music? You'll get to know me

Quote.Author: Banks
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very passionate, very emotional, very sensitive. I've always been like that

Quote.Author: Banks
Quote.QuoteValue: I know every line to 'The Little Rascals.'

Quote.Author: Banks
Quote.QuoteValue: I tend to wear all black. I like feeling sexy, feminine, effortless, and real

Quote.Author: Banks
Quote.QuoteValue: My music is the most 'me' thing about me. Everything is in my music

Quote.Author: Banks
Quote.QuoteValue: I got a psychology degree from USC, but music is just my whole life

Quote.Author: Barbara Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: I think togetherness is a very important ingredient to family life

Quote.Author: Barbara Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: Cherish your human connections - your relationships with friends and family

Quote.Author: Barbara Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: To us, family means putting your arms around each other and being there

Quote.Author: Barbara Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: When you come to a roadblock, take a detour

Quote.Author: Barbara Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: Believe in something larger than yourself... get involved in the big ideas of your time

Quote.Author: Barbara Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: I may be the only mother in America who knows exactly what their child is up to all the time

Quote.Author: Barbara Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to love your children unselfishly. That's hard. But it's the only way

Quote.Author: Barbara Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: I married the first man I ever kissed. When I tell this to my children, they just about throw up

Quote.Author: Barbara Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: My son, George, has been a bad, bad boy! Right, George?

Quote.Author: Barbara Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: It was the dumbest thing I had ever seen, but it's a family thing, and I guess it's clean

Quote.Author: Barbara Jordan
Quote.QuoteValue: What the people want is very simple - they want an America as good as its promise

Quote.Author: Barbara Jordan
Quote.QuoteValue: Do not call for black power or green power. Call for brain power

Quote.Author: Barbara Jordan
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're going to play the game properly, you'd better know every rule

Quote.Author: Barbara Jordan
Quote.QuoteValue: I never intended to become a run-of-the-mill person

Quote.Author: Barbara Jordan
Quote.QuoteValue: For all of its uncertainty, we cannot flee the future

Quote.Author: Barbara Jordan
Quote.QuoteValue: I have confidence that we can form this kind of national community

Quote.Author: Barbara Jordan
Quote.QuoteValue: The imperative is to define what is right and do it

Quote.Author: Barbara Jordan
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is too large to hang out a sign: 'For Men Only.'

Quote.Author: Barbara Jordan
Quote.QuoteValue: Education remains the key to both economic and political empowerment

Quote.Author: Barbara Jordan
Quote.QuoteValue: The citizens of America expect more. They deserve and they want more than a recital of problems

Quote.Author: Barbara Kingsolver
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes the strength of motherhood is greater than natural laws

Quote.Author: Barbara Kingsolver
Quote.QuoteValue: Memory is a complicated thing, a relative to truth, but not its twin

Quote.Author: Barbara Kingsolver
Quote.QuoteValue: Small change, small wonders - these are the currency of my endurance and ultimately of my life

Quote.Author: Barbara Kingsolver
Quote.QuoteValue: It's surprising how much memory is built around things unnoticed at the time

Quote.Author: Barbara Kingsolver
Quote.QuoteValue: Pain reaches the heart with electrical speed, but truth moves to the heart as slowly as a glacier

Quote.Author: Barbara Kingsolver
Quote.QuoteValue: It kills you to see them grow up. But I guess it would kill you quicker if they didn't

Quote.Author: Barbara Kingsolver
Quote.QuoteValue: I do my best work if I think about what it is I have to offer

Quote.Author: Barbara Kingsolver
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up aware of all the people I depended on and who depended on me

Quote.Author: Barbara Kingsolver
Quote.QuoteValue: The first sentence of a book is a promise

Quote.Author: Barbara Kingsolver
Quote.QuoteValue: I live in a rural part of Virginia surrounded by farms and farmers

Quote.Author: Barbra Streisand
Quote.QuoteValue: I can take any truth; just don't lie to me

Quote.Author: Barbra Streisand
Quote.QuoteValue: I am simple, complex, generous, selfish, unattractive, beautiful, lazy, and driven

Quote.Author: Barbra Streisand
Quote.QuoteValue: I just don't want to be hampered by my own limitations

Quote.Author: Barbra Streisand
Quote.QuoteValue: They're called 'angels' because they're in heaven until the reviews come out

Quote.Author: Barbra Streisand
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't care what you say about me. Just be sure to spell my name wrong

Quote.Author: Barbra Streisand
Quote.QuoteValue: I hated singing. I wanted to be an actress. But I don't think I'd have made it any other way

Quote.Author: Barbra Streisand
Quote.QuoteValue: I knew that with a mouth like mine, I just hadda be a star or something

Quote.Author: Barbra Streisand
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not that ambitious any more. I just like my privacy. I wish I really wasn't talked about at all

Quote.Author: Barbra Streisand
Quote.QuoteValue: Myths are a waste of time. They prevent progression

Quote.Author: Barbra Streisand
Quote.QuoteValue: Success to me is having ten honeydew melons and eating only the top half of each slice

Quote.Author: Barney Frank
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm antisocial - there's no question about it

Quote.Author: Barney Frank
Quote.QuoteValue: And I think there is too much bloviating around from politicians

Quote.Author: Barney Frank
Quote.QuoteValue: People are entitled to the presumption of innocence

Quote.Author: Barney Frank
Quote.QuoteValue: The regulation of medicine has been a State function

Quote.Author: Barney Frank
Quote.QuoteValue: I will tell you, I'm a lousy cook, but I think I'm a pretty good judge of a good meal

Quote.Author: Barney Frank
Quote.QuoteValue: Television is apparently the enemy of nuance. But nuance is essential for a thoughtful discussion

Quote.Author: Barney Frank
Quote.QuoteValue: Community action is as valuable a principle on the international level as it has been domestically

Quote.Author: Barney Frank
Quote.QuoteValue: It seems to me that politicians ought to use the same words as other people

Quote.Author: Barney Frank
Quote.QuoteValue: Now, most of the time I'm going to agree with the Democrats and disagree with the Republicans

Quote.Author: Barney Frank
Quote.QuoteValue: What's troubling is that the Republicans to defend Mr. DeLay are weakening the ethics process

Quote.Author: Barry Bonds
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know what my future is

Quote.Author: Barry Bonds
Quote.QuoteValue: I never stop looking for things to try and make myself better

Quote.Author: Barry Bonds
Quote.QuoteValue: But to be the best, you must face the best. And to overcome your fear, you must deal with the best

Quote.Author: Barry Bonds
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to be against the odds

Quote.Author: Barry Bonds
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not afraid to be lonely at the top

Quote.Author: Barry Bonds
Quote.QuoteValue: It's called talent. I just have it. I can't explain it. You either have it or you don't

Quote.Author: Barry Bonds
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not the name that makes the player. It's the player

Quote.Author: Barry Bonds
Quote.QuoteValue: My career is an open book, but my life is not

Quote.Author: Barry Bonds
Quote.QuoteValue: Every pitcher can beat you, it doesn't matter how good you are

Quote.Author: Barry Bonds
Quote.QuoteValue: I think everyone needs to be a role model, period

Quote.Author: Barry Goldwater
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't have to be straight to be in the military; you just have to be able to shoot straight

Quote.Author: Barry Goldwater
Quote.QuoteValue: You've got to forget about this civilian. Whenever you drop bombs, you're going to hit civilians

Quote.Author: Barry Goldwater
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't need to be straight to fight and die for your country. You just need to shoot straight

Quote.Author: Barry Goldwater
Quote.QuoteValue: To disagree, one doesn't have to be disagreeable

Quote.Author: Barry Goldwater
Quote.QuoteValue: I wouldn't trust Nixon from here to that phone

Quote.Author: Barry Goldwater
Quote.QuoteValue: The only summit meeting that can succeed is the one that does not take place

Quote.Author: Barry Goldwater
Quote.QuoteValue: The income tax created more criminals than any other single act of government

Quote.Author: Barry Goldwater
Quote.QuoteValue: I could have ended the war in a month. I could have made North Vietnam look like a mud puddle

Quote.Author: Barry Goldwater
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a great country, where anybody can grow up to be president... except me

Quote.Author: Barry Goldwater
Quote.QuoteValue: I will offer a choice, not an echo

Quote.Author: Barry Ritholtz
Quote.QuoteValue: The beauty of diversification is it's about as close as you can get to a free lunch in investing

Quote.Author: Barry Ritholtz
Quote.QuoteValue: Never forget this simple truism: Forecasting is marketing, plain and simple

Quote.Author: Barry Ritholtz
Quote.QuoteValue: When it comes to investing, there is no such thing as a one-size-fits-all portfolio

Quote.Author: Barry Ritholtz
Quote.QuoteValue: We love a tale of heroes and villains and conflicts requiring a neat resolution

Quote.Author: Barry Ritholtz
Quote.QuoteValue: Good investors must learn to contextualize the daily background noise

Quote.Author: Barry Ritholtz
Quote.QuoteValue: The consumption and production of energy is a major component of the global economy

Quote.Author: Barry Ritholtz
Quote.QuoteValue: How are the cabs in your city? In Manhattan, where I work, they are rather awful

Quote.Author: Barry Ritholtz
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a shortage of doctors, and the American Medical Association is aiming to keep it that way

Quote.Author: Barry Ritholtz
Quote.QuoteValue: When it comes to investing, you are your own worst enemy

Quote.Author: Barry Ritholtz
Quote.QuoteValue: Anyone can make an article longer; the skill is keeping it tight and lean

Quote.Author: Barry Sternlicht
Quote.QuoteValue: As the facts change, change your thesis. Don't be a stubborn mule, or you'll get killed

Quote.Author: Barry Sternlicht
Quote.QuoteValue: The American dream is still to own your home

Quote.Author: Barry Sternlicht
Quote.QuoteValue: It's cheaper to buy a house and finance it than it is to rent in many markets

Quote.Author: Barry Sternlicht
Quote.QuoteValue: We have an impact on nature, and nature has an impact on us

Quote.Author: Barry Sternlicht
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to start a hotel company from scratch

Quote.Author: Barry Sternlicht
Quote.QuoteValue: You go public because you want access to capital in the form of debt and equity

Quote.Author: Barry Sternlicht
Quote.QuoteValue: If it can be profitable to be green, that's just smart business

Quote.Author: Barry Sternlicht
Quote.QuoteValue: There's more single-family homes rented in the United States then there are apartments

Quote.Author: Barry Sternlicht
Quote.QuoteValue: Pay attention to the big themes because that's what will help you earn ten times your money

Quote.Author: Barry Sternlicht
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to go to my simple cottage by the ocean or, really, any beach!

Quote.Author: Barry White
Quote.QuoteValue: When I saw corruption, I was forced to find truth on my own. I couldn't swallow the hypocrisy

Quote.Author: Barry White
Quote.QuoteValue: I went to jail at 16 for stealing tires off Cadillacs. When I got out I said, Never again

Quote.Author: Barry White
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll come to you with gifts of knowledge, wisdom and truth

Quote.Author: Barry White
Quote.QuoteValue: I try to tell a story musically in a song

Quote.Author: Barry White
Quote.QuoteValue: Mama tried to save us from the streets, but the streets were too strong

Quote.Author: Barry White
Quote.QuoteValue: People are always looking for me to be a freak, weird

Quote.Author: Barry White
Quote.QuoteValue: There's people making babies to my music. That's nice

Quote.Author: Barry White
Quote.QuoteValue: The whole system of society tells you what to do

Quote.Author: Barry White
Quote.QuoteValue: Elton John's opinion turned the label's opinion around, all in a day

Quote.Author: Barry White
Quote.QuoteValue: One preacher turned me on, another turned me off

Quote.Author: Barton Gellman
Quote.QuoteValue: As militias go, the Ohio Defense Force is on the moderate side

Quote.Author: Barton Gellman
Quote.QuoteValue: Privacy and encryption work, but it's too easy to make a mistake that exposes you

Quote.Author: Barton Gellman
Quote.QuoteValue: Some misunderstandings are hard to cure

Quote.Author: Barton Gellman
Quote.QuoteValue: All Americans are dependent for their energy on the Arabian peninsula

Quote.Author: Barton Gellman
Quote.QuoteValue: The modern era of continuity planning began under President Ronald Reagan

Quote.Author: Barton Gellman
Quote.QuoteValue: Snowden is an orderly thinker, with an engineer's approach to problem-solving

Quote.Author: Barton Gellman
Quote.QuoteValue: True net-heads sometimes resort to punctuation cartoons to get around the absence of inflection

Quote.Author: Barton Gellman
Quote.QuoteValue: Most computers today have built in backup software

Quote.Author: Barton Gellman
Quote.QuoteValue: We know what's in our Cheerios and in our retirement accounts because the law requires disclosure

Quote.Author: Barton Gellman
Quote.QuoteValue: Iraq has, in effect, one export of any consequence. That's oil

Quote.Author: Baruch Spinoza
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want the present to be different from the past, study the past

Quote.Author: Baruch Spinoza
Quote.QuoteValue: Those who are believed to be most abject and humble are usually most ambitious and envious

Quote.Author: Baruch Spinoza
Quote.QuoteValue: I do not know how to teach philosophy without becoming a disturber of established religion

Quote.Author: Baruch Spinoza
Quote.QuoteValue: He alone is free who lives with free consent under the entire guidance of reason

Quote.Author: Baruch Spinoza
Quote.QuoteValue: Do not weep; do not wax indignant. Understand

Quote.Author: Baruch Spinoza
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest pride, or the greatest despondency, is the greatest ignorance of one's self

Quote.Author: Baruch Spinoza
Quote.QuoteValue: All things excellent are as difficult as they are rare

Quote.Author: Baruch Spinoza
Quote.QuoteValue: Whatsoever is, is in God, and without God nothing can be, or be conceived

Quote.Author: Baruch Spinoza
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing exists from whose nature some effect does not follow

Quote.Author: Baruch Spinoza
Quote.QuoteValue: The world would be happier if men had the same capacity to be silent that they have to speak

Quote.Author: Baz Luhrmann
Quote.QuoteValue: If Paris is a city of lights, Sydney is the city of fireworks

Quote.Author: Baz Luhrmann
Quote.QuoteValue: A life lived in fear is a life half lived

Quote.Author: Baz Luhrmann
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel like a member of any group comprised of outsiders

Quote.Author: Baz Luhrmann
Quote.QuoteValue: I do find walking is fundamental to my creative process

Quote.Author: Baz Luhrmann
Quote.QuoteValue: I never see things I make in the same way that the audience does. You can never do that

Quote.Author: Baz Luhrmann
Quote.QuoteValue: I love dancing

Quote.Author: Baz Luhrmann
Quote.QuoteValue: I think dance in any culture, in any form, is a true leveler

Quote.Author: Baz Luhrmann
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything I make starts very personally

Quote.Author: Baz Luhrmann
Quote.QuoteValue: I always have a point of view. It may not be right, but it's my own

Quote.Author: Baz Luhrmann
Quote.QuoteValue: At a very young age I was allowed to go into the cinema and watch adult films

Quote.Author: Bear Grylls
Quote.QuoteValue: As a young boy, scouting gave me a confidence and camaraderie that is hard to find in modern life

Quote.Author: Bear Grylls
Quote.QuoteValue: You only get one chance at life and you have to grab it boldly

Quote.Author: Bear Grylls
Quote.QuoteValue: I always wanted to be Robin Hood or John the Baptist when I was growing up

Quote.Author: Bear Grylls
Quote.QuoteValue: The rules of survival never change, whether you're in a desert or in an arena

Quote.Author: Bear Grylls
Quote.QuoteValue: But the wild is unpredictable, stuff does happen, and it's always when you're least expecting it

Quote.Author: Bear Grylls
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody else is stupid enough to get themselves into the straits that I get into

Quote.Author: Bear Grylls
Quote.QuoteValue: Look, sometimes, no matter how hard you try, sometimes you need a bit of luck

Quote.Author: Bear Grylls
Quote.QuoteValue: I try and eat really healthy when I'm home, but I certainly don't eat worms and snakes

Quote.Author: Bear Grylls
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't often see Bear Grylls in a suit

Quote.Author: Bear Grylls
Quote.QuoteValue: Faith is personal if it's to be real

Quote.Author: Beatrice Wood
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like to sell my finest pieces

Quote.Author: Beatrice Wood
Quote.QuoteValue: My life is full of mistakes. They're like pebbles that make a good road

Quote.Author: Beatrice Wood
Quote.QuoteValue: And I have exposed myself to art so that my work has something beyond just the usual potter

Quote.Author: Beatrice Wood
Quote.QuoteValue: Over and over I'm on the point of giving it up

Quote.Author: Beatrice Wood
Quote.QuoteValue: Certainly I was relatively a refined person. No way a tramp

Quote.Author: Beatrice Wood
Quote.QuoteValue: Here in America we're doing the most wonderful crafts

Quote.Author: Beatrice Wood
Quote.QuoteValue: I happen to believe that there is an afterlife

Quote.Author: Beatrice Wood
Quote.QuoteValue: Sex is energy

Quote.Author: Beatrice Wood
Quote.QuoteValue: Yes, because when you're in love, you are shy

Quote.Author: Beatrice Wood
Quote.QuoteValue: And then a great thing in my life was going to India

Quote.Author: Bela Karolyi
Quote.QuoteValue: What is the cruelest thing you can do to someone who is trying to concentrate? Call their name

Quote.Author: Bela Karolyi
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm tired of being hunted all over. I can't go anywhere without criticism

Quote.Author: Bela Karolyi
Quote.QuoteValue: Just like an animal, when you want to survive, you don't think anymore

Quote.Author: Bela Karolyi
Quote.QuoteValue: I consider myself very lucky that I could live my life through all the ups and downs

Quote.Author: Bela Karolyi
Quote.QuoteValue: The Olympics shows the community what gymnastics is all about

Quote.Author: Bela Karolyi
Quote.QuoteValue: I know gymnastics. It's always been a subjective appreciation

Quote.Author: Bela Karolyi
Quote.QuoteValue: I am very familiar with Hungary, because I grew up in Romania, which borders it

Quote.Author: Bela Karolyi
Quote.QuoteValue: Genetics is all about showcasing human beauty along with high-quality performance

Quote.Author: Bela Karolyi
Quote.QuoteValue: The rest of the world laughed at American gymnastics before I came

Quote.Author: Bela Karolyi
Quote.QuoteValue: The crowd sometimes plays a tremendous role to give you wings and carry you to victory

Quote.Author: Bela Lugosi
Quote.QuoteValue: People, chained by monotony, afraid to think, clinging to certainties... they live like ants

Quote.Author: Bela Lugosi
Quote.QuoteValue: I look in the mirror and say to myself, Can it be you once played Romeo?

Quote.Author: Bela Lugosi
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have a dime left. I am dependent on my friends for food and a small old-age pension

Quote.Author: Bela Lugosi
Quote.QuoteValue: My close-up was magnificent!

Quote.Author: Bela Lugosi
Quote.QuoteValue: Women have a predestination to suffering

Quote.Author: Bela Lugosi
Quote.QuoteValue: To win a woman, take her with you to see Dracula

Quote.Author: Bela Lugosi
Quote.QuoteValue: The love-bite, it is the beginning. You will be irresistible

Quote.Author: Bela Lugosi
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd like to quit the supernatural roles and play just an interesting, down-to-earth person

Quote.Author: Bela Lugosi
Quote.QuoteValue: I have never met a vampire personally, but I don't know what might happen tomorrow

Quote.Author: Bela Lugosi
Quote.QuoteValue: Of all the roles I've done on the stage, I'm partial to Cyrano de Bergerac

Quote.Author: bell hooks
Quote.QuoteValue: I think life experiences are different for people who know what they want as children

Quote.Author: bell hooks
Quote.QuoteValue: Life-transforming ideas have always come to me through books

Quote.Author: bell hooks
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel that my environment reflects my belief in the grace and art and elegance of living simply

Quote.Author: bell hooks
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I was always obsessed with esthetics

Quote.Author: bell hooks
Quote.QuoteValue: I think Black people need to take self-esteem seriously

Quote.Author: bell hooks
Quote.QuoteValue: Every terrorist regime in the world uses isolation to break people's spirits

Quote.Author: bell hooks
Quote.QuoteValue: Any society based on domination supports and condones violence

Quote.Author: bell hooks
Quote.QuoteValue: Until the legacy of remembered and reenacted trauma is taken seriously, black America cannot heal

Quote.Author: bell hooks
Quote.QuoteValue: Class is more than money. Class is also about knowledge

Quote.Author: bell hooks
Quote.QuoteValue: I love my family, even as I critique their dysfunctionalities

Quote.Author: Bella Hadid
Quote.QuoteValue: I definitely gain weight, and I'm not naturally thin

Quote.Author: Bella Hadid
Quote.QuoteValue: I just aspire to be the best I can be. I want to work hard and set one goal at a time for myself

Quote.Author: Bella Hadid
Quote.QuoteValue: I still feel awkward taking a selfie sometimes; it feels a little weird

Quote.Author: Bella Hadid
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm so socially awkward. I really had to put myself out there and meet new people

Quote.Author: Bella Hadid
Quote.QuoteValue: I eat a lot of pizza and really unhealthy food

Quote.Author: Bella Hadid
Quote.QuoteValue: There wasn't really one time in my life where I was like, 'I want to be a model!'

Quote.Author: Bella Hadid
Quote.QuoteValue: In L.A., I did a lot of vintage flea market dresses and Doc Martens

Quote.Author: Bella Hadid
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to do at least 15 minutes of cardio every day if I can fit it in

Quote.Author: Bella Hadid
Quote.QuoteValue: My body really reacts well to not eating a lot of wheat or dairy and staying on healthy foods

Quote.Author: Bella Hadid
Quote.QuoteValue: I always love to dress up, but I usually end up in a leather jacket and boots!

Quote.Author: Bella Thorne
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't try to impress people. Always be yourself!

Quote.Author: Bella Thorne
Quote.QuoteValue: I never saw myself as a singer; I never really thought I had the voice for it

Quote.Author: Bella Thorne
Quote.QuoteValue: I really love big scarves. I have a whole bunch
